ISSUE.TITLE: API keys should be supported in the HTTP headers
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Currently it seems that all API calls must include the `api_key` in the query string. Ideally the HTTP headers could also be used (e.g. `Authorization: Key XXXX` or `X-Api-Key`) so that Web server logs don't log the API key in the clear.
